Name: Face Threat
Description: Face the player with the highest Threat

Name: Attack Threat
Description: Face the player with the highest Threat and immediately peform one attack

Name: Dive Right
Description: Rotate to the right and immediately peform one attack

Name: Dive Left
Description: Rotate to the left and immediately peform one attack

Name: Spin Attack
Description: Rotate twice to face backwards and immediately peform one attack

Name: Pounce
Description: Dragon doesn't move and immediately peform one attack
